page.title: 14 TRAFFIC PROBLEMS
page.content: Middleton Stoney is plagued by two very busy roads which disrupt the tranquility of the village.The A43 (Oxford-Northampton) is unsuitable for the heavy traffic which uses it.The proposed M40 linking Oxford with the Birmingham motorway system will run approximately 1km east of Middleton Stoney with access within 4km of the village.The residents have strongly backed the M40 during the planning period. The M40 may also alleviate traffic between Bicester and the USAF base at Upper Heyford.The B4030 is very dangerouse for pedestrians and many accidents have resulted. In time the village will revert to a more quiet way of life.
